attributes.action: Bring Back Russell Brand to BBC2 Radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to bring back Russel Brand to the BBC radio station.
Whilst the phone call made may have been in bad taste, I believe that both Brand and Ross have been unfairly judged and subsiquently forced out of their jobs due to this media circus that was dipicted in an out of context and witch hunt manor.
Lets bring back Russell Brand !!!!!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
